languages.text: "Довольно болтовни. Тавриск, начинай!" {n}Старик с тассерциевыми глазами, надрывно хрипя, исторгает из беззубого рта поток нечестивых слов, начертанные под вашей клеткой линии словно делают вдох, наливаясь светом.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Довольно болтовни. Тавриск, начинай!" {n}Старик с тассерциевыми глазами, надрывно хрипя, исторгает из беззубого рта поток нечестивых слов, начертанные под вашей клеткой линии словно делают вдох, наливаясь багряным светом.{/n}

languages.text: "Enough chitchat. Tavrisk, begin!" {n}Wheezing raspily, the old man with the thassertium eyes spews a torrent of unholy words from his toothless mouth. In response, the markings beneath your cage seem to inhale, and begin glowing with light.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Довольно болтовни. Тавриск, начинай!" {n}Старик с тассерциевыми глазами, надрывно хрипя, исторгает из беззубого рта поток нечестивых слов, начертанные под вашей клеткой линии словно делают вдох, наливаясь светом.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Enough chitchat. Tavrisk, begin!" {n}The old man with the thassertium eyes, wheezing raspily, spews a torrent of unholy words from his toothless mouth, and the markings beneath your cage seem to breathe in, glowing with light.{/n}

"Enough chitchat. Tavrisk, begin!" {n}The old man with the thassertium eyes, wheezing raspily, spews a torrent of unholy words from his toothless mouth, and the markings beneath your cage seem to breathe in, glowing with light.{/n}

"Enough chitchat. Tavrisk, begin!" {n}Wheezing raspily, the old man with the thassertium eyes spews a torrent of unholy words from his toothless mouth. In response, the markings beneath your cage seem to inhale, and begin glowing with light.{/n}

languages.text: “闲聊到此为止。塔夫瑞克，动手吧！”{n}听到这句话，那个双眼镶嵌着塔瑟拉水晶的老人嘶哑地喘息起来，没有牙齿的口中吐出一连串邪恶的话语。随后，你笼子旁边的印记仿佛开始喘息一般，慢慢绽放出了光芒。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Enough chitchat. Tavrisk, begin!" {n}Wheezing raspily, the old man with the thassertium eyes spews a torrent of unholy words from his toothless mouth. In response, the markings beneath your cage seem to inhale, and begin glowing with light.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “闲聊到此为止。塔夫瑞克，动手吧！”{n}听到这句话，那个双眼镶嵌着塔瑟拉水晶的老人嘶哑地喘息起来，没有牙齿的口中吐出一连串邪恶的话语。随后，你笼子旁边的印记仿佛开始喘息一般，慢慢绽放出了光芒。{/n}

languages.text: «Basta de cháchara. ¡Tavrisk, empiece ya!». {n}Jadeando, el anciano de los ojos de thassertio escupe un torrente de blasfemias por su desdentada boca. En respuesta, los símbolos que hay debajo de tu jaula se iluminan con un fulgor, como si absorbieran la diabólica letanía.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Enough chitchat. Tavrisk, begin!" {n}Wheezing raspily, the old man with the thassertium eyes spews a torrent of unholy words from his toothless mouth. In response, the markings beneath your cage seem to inhale, and begin glowing with light.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Basta de cháchara. ¡Tavrisk, empiece ya!». {n}Jadeando, el anciano de los ojos de thassertio escupe un torrente de blasfemias por su desdentada boca. En respuesta, los símbolos que hay debajo de tu jaula se iluminan con un fulgor, como si absorbieran la diabólica letanía.{/n}

languages.text: "Yeter bu kadar laf salatası. Tavrisk, başla!" {n}Tasertiyum gözlü yaşlı adam, hırıltılı bir şekilde dişsiz ağzından kutsal olmayan kelimelerden bir sel kusuyor. Buna karşın kafesinin altındaki işaretler, sanki nefes alıp ışıkla parlamaya başlıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Enough chitchat. Tavrisk, begin!" {n}Wheezing raspily, the old man with the thassertium eyes spews a torrent of unholy words from his toothless mouth. In response, the markings beneath your cage seem to inhale, and begin glowing with light.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Yeter bu kadar laf salatası. Tavrisk, başla!" {n}Tasertiyum gözlü yaşlı adam, hırıltılı bir şekilde dişsiz ağzından kutsal olmayan kelimelerden bir sel kusuyor. Buna karşın kafesinin altındaki işaretler, sanki nefes alıp ışıkla parlamaya başlıyor.{/n}

languages.text: 「おしゃべりは十分だ。タヴリスク、始めろ！」{n}タッセリウムの目を持つ老人は、かすれた喘鳴を鳴らし、歯のない口から不浄な言葉を発し、牢屋の下のマーキングが息をするように深紅の光で発光する。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Enough chitchat. Tavrisk, begin!" {n}The old man with the thassertium eyes, wheezing raspily, spews a torrent of unholy words from his toothless mouth, and the markings beneath your cage seem to breathe in, glowing with crimson light.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「おしゃべりは十分だ。タヴリスク、始めろ！」{n}タッセリウムの目を持つ老人は、かすれた喘鳴を鳴らし、歯のない口から不浄な言葉を発し、牢屋の下のマーキングが息をするように深紅の光で発光する。{/n}

languages.text: « Assez bavassé. Au travail, Tavrisk ! » {n}La respiration rauque, le vieil homme aux yeux en thassertium crache un torrent de paroles impies de sa bouche édentée. En réponse, les marques sous votre cage se mettent à briller d'une lueur intense.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Enough chitchat. Tavrisk, begin!" {n}Wheezing raspily, the old man with the thassertium eyes spews a torrent of unholy words from his toothless mouth. In response, the markings beneath your cage seem to inhale, and begin glowing with light.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Assez bavassé. Au travail, Tavrisk ! » {n}La respiration rauque, le vieil homme aux yeux en thassertium crache un torrent de paroles impies de sa bouche édentée. En réponse, les marques sous votre cage se mettent à briller d'une lueur intense.{/n}

languages.text: "Genug geplaudert. Tavrisk, beginnt!" {n}Der alte Mann mit den Thassertium-Augen stößt keuchend einen Schwall unheiliger Wörter aus seinem zahnlosen Mund aus. Die Markierungen unter deinem Käfig scheinen daraufhin einzuatmen und leuchten rot auf.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Enough chitchat. Tavrisk, begin!" {n}Wheezing raspily, the old man with the thassertium eyes spews a torrent of unholy words from his toothless mouth. In response, the markings beneath your cage seem to inhale, and begin glowing with light.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Genug geplaudert. Tavrisk, beginnt!" {n}Der alte Mann mit den Thassertium-Augen stößt keuchend einen Schwall unheiliger Wörter aus seinem zahnlosen Mund aus. Die Markierungen unter deinem Käfig scheinen daraufhin einzuatmen und leuchten rot auf.{/n}
